Web Item Name: B5 M:4 Multitasker Multi-Tool Black
Web Item Description:
The M:4 is precision machined from solid bar stock using wire-EDM/CNC and fits discreetly with no visible footprint inside our specially inletted buttpad. Easily accessible without tools simply by pressing the release tabs on the buttpad (sold separately). Dot coded to indicate functions.

The M:4 is a patent pending 1-piece multi-tool for the M4 carbine designed and manufactured by MultiTasker in conjunction with B5 Systems.

Features:

  • Features a slotted screwdriver castle nut spanner 1/2" hex for scope mounts and bolt override
  • Precision machined from barstock
  • Nests inside the b5 systems buttpad
  • MADE IN THE USA

Web Item Name: Old Timer Knife Combo Tin Fixed and Folding Knives
Web Item Description:
The Old Timer 3 Pc Set Fixed-Lockback and Folder Brown Polymer Sawcut Handle Combo is a versatile and reliable knife collection designed for outdoor enthusiasts campers and anyone who appreciates classic craftsmanship paired with modern functionality. This carefully curated trio offers the perfect balance of utility portability and durability making it a dependable choice for a wide range of tasks from everyday carry to heavy-duty outdoor work.

Each knife in the set features a brown polymer sawcut handle providing a comfortable and secure grip while also offering a timeless rugged aesthetic. The textured handle ensures control during use even in wet or challenging conditions while the durable polymer construction withstands the rigors of daily use and outdoor adventures.

The blades are crafted from high-carbon stainless steel delivering exceptional strength corrosion resistance and sharpness. Each blade is precision-ground to provide dependable cutting performance whether you're preparing a campsite performing light woodworking or tackling general utility tasks. The folding knives feature a lockback mechanism keeping the blade securely open during use and enhancing overall safety.

This 3-piece set includes a fixed blade knife for heavy-duty tasks a lockback folder for convenient everyday carry and a traditional folding knife for versatile general use. The fixed knife is ideal for outdoor and utility applications while the lockback and traditional folders are compact enough for safe and practical EDC. This combination ensures that no matter the task you have the right tool ready and accessible.

Item Name: SOG ONE ZERO AU 3.1'' DROP POINT BLADE BOX SILVER + CHROME
Web Item Name: SOG Knives One-Zero AU Folding Knife 3-1/10 Drop Point Blade Silver Chrome
Web Item Description: One-Zero AU is the apex gentlemans automatic knife made for daily carry. Due to its secure auto-locking mechanism users can count on safe operation immediately upon the blade’s deployment regardless of the task they’re taking on. And thanks to its rugged CRYO CPM S35VN steel drop-point blade with a satin two-tone finish it’s sure to make quick work of every job every time. Attached to the blade is a sculpted aircraft-grade aluminum handle with hidden fasteners providing an elegant look and a comfortable secure grip whatever the task is at hand. The handles hard annodized finish will withstand years of use and still look fresh.

Web Item Name: SOG Seal Commander Knife Clip Point Blade Box
Web Item Description:
The Seal Commander a new fixed blade from SOG Knives is a true cutting-edge tribute to legendary craftsmanship and American ingenuity. Featuring a robust S35VN steel blade it guarantees exceptional sharpness edge retention and durability making it capable of withstanding even the most demanding outdoor missions you’ll face in the coming year. Modeled after the iconic MACV-SOG blade from the Vietnam conflict the clip-style blade combines historical design with modern performance with the addition of a black PDV finish for enhanced corrosion resistance and a sleek tactical aesthetic. Attached to that blade is a Micarta handle that delivers a secure yet comfortable grip as well as precise control over the tool in any situation. Proudly made in the USA the SOG Seal Commander is without question the pinnacle of quality and heritage.

  • Modeled after the iconic MACV-SOG blade from the Vietnam conflict
  • Boasts a S35VN steel blade with a durable and aesthetically pleasing black PVD finish
  • Fine clip-point is well-suited for precision tasks like piercing and slicing through tough materials
  • Rugged Micarta handle delivers a sure hold even in wet messy conditions
  • Measures 10″ overall
  • Wt.: 7 oz.
  • Made in the USA

Web Item Description: This precision Karambit forged from 420 stainless steel is a must have for your tactical arsenal. With a razor-sharp 4 ¾” inch blade this knife is a testament to precision and durability. The wooden handles provide a comfortable and secure grip ensuring every movement is controlled and precise. Comes with a built in saw feature and a nylon sheath.

Web Item Name: SOG Knives Tellus Multi-Tool OD Green
Web Item Description:
Designed to be your go-to solution for a wide range of daily challenges this versatile tool is equipped with a variety of essential tools including round pliers a saw flat and Phillips screwdriver heads an awl a chisel tweezers and scissors. With that lineup you can take on everything from gripping bending and twisting to cutting piercing scraping and even detailed precision work all at a moment’s notice. Each tool folds outward from a durable G-10 handle that provides a secure comfortable grip ensuring users can work with the utmost confidence regardless of the situation or the weather. When not in use simply tuck each into its designated place in the multi-tool stash the whole setup in your pants pocket and you’re ready to roll.

  • Handy multi-tool features a variety of fold-out components for tackling everyday tasks
  • Ideal for use everywhere from around the house to deep in the woods
  • Tools include:
    • Main knife blade for any cutting task
    • Needle nose pliers for gripping bending and twisting wire and other materials
    • Soft wire cutters create clean precise cuts
    • Saw for cutting through wood plastic and more
    • Flat and Phillips screwdriver heads
    • Awl for piercing and hole-punching tasks
    • Chisel for scraping and shaping
    • Tweezers for precise grabbing and safety needs
    • Scissors for any additional cutting tasks you encounter
    • Firestarter and file striker for creating a source of heat in emergencies
    • Bottle opener just in case
  • No-slip G-10 handle ensures a solid grip in any weather under any circumstances
  • Folds up and fits easily into any pants backpack or other pocket for simple storage

Item Name: SOG FLASH MT - URBAN GRAY & CYAN MULTI-TOOL
Web Item Name: SOG Flash MT Multi-Tool Urban Grey & Cyan
Web Item Description:
A street-smart multi-tool that boasts everyday capabilities in a compact package. For those who value daily readiness the versatile Flash MT provides an understated and highly functional solution. Its unique stainless-steel housing holds seven tools and the plier head uses SOG’s trademark Compound Leverage. SOG’s team heaped special attention on the assisted opening CRYO D2 steel blade making it more practical than most multi-tool knives. It’s a modern styled multi-tool that’s a breeze to carry and use all day every day. 

Components include compound leverage pliers wire cutter magnetic bit holder and bits bottle opener assisted open clip point blade flat head screwdriver.

Item Name: SOG SLIM JIM 2.0 3.18'' BLADE CLAM PACK SATIN
Web Item Name: SOG Knives Slim Jim 2.0 Assisted Folding Knife 3-1/5 Clip Point Blade Clam Pack
Web Item Description:
The SOG Slim Jim 2.0 Folding Knife is an updated version of the original boasting a 3.18” clip-point style blade made from Cryo AUS 8 steel tough enough to take on anything from slicing through cardboard boxes to surviving the apocalypse. It opens smoothly and easily with one hand and at just 2.4 oz. is lightweight enough to tag along for the ride wherever you may be headed. And with a handle made from 420 stainless steel you’ll have a grip so solid and secure that you’ll never worry about losing your hold on the thing. From survivalists to collectors and every other kind of knife enthusiast in between this assisted folder is the perfect addition to your arsenal and promises a whole lot of fun to go along with it!

  • An updated take on the original SOG design
  • Assisted folding knife design
  • Compact and lightweight enough to serve as your new EDC
  • Tough 3.18” clip-point style blade is forged from Cryo AUS 8 steel
  • Sure-grip 20 stainless steel handle helps users maintain complete control
  • Smooth one-handed flip-open operation
  • Measures 7.4” overall
  • Wt.: 2.4 oz.

Web Item Name: Sarges Knives Angler's Edge - 5pc Fishing Kit
Web Item Description:
Imagine that the next time you get ready to clean fish and fillet the meat that you open your hard shell plastic carrying case and there lies an 8" fillet knife a 6" fillet knife a 5" fillet knife with a serrated scaler an 11 1/2" steel sharpening rod and a cutting board. Well you don't have to imagine any longer. Our 5-piece fishing knife kit features tools made with 420 stainless steel and green handles with black non-slip rubber inserts that fit neatly into a blow-mold case.

Features:

  • Steel: 440 Stainless
  • Handle: Zytel with Rubber Grip
  • Sharpening Rod: 11.5" Overall
  • Fillet #1: 7.5" Blade 12.5" Overall
  • Fillet #2: 6" Blade 11" Overall
  • Serrated Knife: 4.75" Blade with Scaler 10" Overall
  • Includes: Cutting Board
  • Case: Black Hard Plastic Blow Mold
